content: I am working on packaging (with Maven) the FHIR UCUM Validator project in order to publish to Maven Central. I was made aware that this project is used by the FHIR build tooling via command line. I am guessing the command line signatures will need to be preserved in the packaged version of the project, right? Also, where could I find the signatures? Thanks!
once the package is released on Maven, I'll rework the build to use the jar as released on Maven
